column2: And I did read many things unto them which were written in the books of Moses; but that I might more fully persuade them to believe in the Lord their Redeemer I did read unto them that which was written by the prophet Isaiah; for I did liken all scriptures unto us
column3: that it might be for our profit and learning.

column2: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him
column3: and he shall direct thy paths.

column2: For God so loved the world
column3: that he gave his only begotten Son
column4: that whosoever believeth in him should not perish
